name: androgen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a male hormone (= any of various chemicals made by living cells that influence the development, growth, sex, etc. of an animal) such as testosterone: Androgens play a role both in hair loss and prostate cancer development.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth men and women have some androgens, but men generally have higher levels.Testosterone is a type of androgen produced primarily by the testicles.A new oral synthetic androgen showed promise as a possible male contraceptive pill.Patients with prostate cancer may have medical intervention to block androgen production.
